title: It wont let me recconect?
body: Im in a skype call with my friends, when suddenly i dc from the game, the weird part is, im stil in a skype call and my wifis fine, but its still trying to recconect, any help?

replies.body: THAT JUST HAPPENED TO ME IN A RANKED GAME AND I GOT A LOSS BECAUSE OF IT! I TRIED TO RECONNECT THE WHOLE TIME. FINALLY I GET IN AND THE GAME ENDS.

You can lose connection to a specific server, but still be able to access other stuff like Skype.  If this issue is still happening, I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot anything that may have changed or blocking you from connecting to our game servers.  Let me know if you have any questions.

I am having the same issue, but your reconnect button is not working. I am having to wait 20 minutes to just get in queue because of bug on your part of the game and not my connection issue. I dont mean to sound rude but this is very upsetting and i hope you can understand.
